name: WorldCraft - Survival
description:
Zombies are coming... You have to find or build shelter before the sun set. If they catch you will lose health and die. But you can fight them back or torch them and watch them burn >:< hahahaha...
This game lets you skilled craftsman to create your perfect dreamland with unlimited sources. Hours of fun waiting awaits you: make houses with amazing gardens, castles, forests and go mining, go swimming etc and fun is free forever you are the god of your own universe be a loving one or destroyer its all up to you. This game is inspired from MineCraft™
Give us 5 starts to improve the game for you and please leave comment. Which upgrade do you want after animals. We appreciate the support. Thanks...’
